about_the_game:
This is the official soundtrack for the indie bullet-hell roguelike Salvo Shuffle, featuring the 15 different electronic songs as heard in-game in disc 1. These 15 are the same as those uploaded to streaming platforms.

As a bonus, you can also download the 'null'-variations of the 6 fight songs that play when there are no enemies in front of you and the instrumental version of New Light on disc 2. These are exclusive to this package on Steam.

Disc 1:
  • Track 1: Main Menu
  • Track 2: Tutorial
  • Tracks 3-8: Normal Fights
  • Tracks 9-10: Firework City*
  • Tracks 11-13: (Mini-)Bosses
  • Track 14: Credits
  • Track 15: Death

Disc 2:
  • Tracks 1-6: Fight song variations when 0 enemies are present (in order of disc 1; tracks 3-8).
  • Track 7: Instrumental version of the final boss song.

*Firework City during gameplay is made up of 2 sections per fight song and a few variations of the verse, chosen depending on which song will play next. The two tracks in this soundtrack are custom arrangements of these sections.

Since the main game is free, this soundtrack is a great way to support me as the developer/composer of Salvo Shuffle.
